entry_points.description: Main orchestration loop running an agent life cycle in population mode.
Automated lifecycle pipeline runner (imprinting -> stabilization -> schooling -> consolidation/dreaming -> evolution).

tests: tests/* (mostly executable verification scripts rather than pytest-style unit tests)

key_features: Lifecycle manager coordinating multiple training phases (imprinting, stabilization/meditation, grounding, schooling, consolidation/dreaming, evolution)
Evolutionary agent orchestration with population management and genome-driven hyperparameters
Neuromodulation-inspired components (dopamine/serotonin/etc.) in the brain modules
Liquid neural network style dynamics (vectorized + sparse implementations)
Optional ONNX export for a 'reflex' inference path

test_conventions.notes: Tests appear to be run as Python scripts (e.g., tests/deep_integrity_test.py, tests/final_verification.py) rather than pytest discovery.
